integration_removed.title: The Mazda integration has been removed
integration_removed.description:
The Mazda integration has been removed from NRJHub.

The library that NRJHub uses to connect with their services, [has been taken offline by Mazda]({dmca}).

To resolve this issue, please remove the (now defunct) integration entries from your NRJHub setup. [Click here to see your existing Mazda integration entries]({entries}).
